column2: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|a letter]] to Alan White''' (aged 13).

typewritten and signed by Tolkien in both Roman letters and [[tengwar]]<ref>[http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/mdtci.html The Mellonath Daeron Index of Tengwa Specimina (DTS)] of the webpage of [[Forodrim]]</ref>.
